item.description:
Come Join Us for Fun & Friendship!


 The Greater Boston Jewish Singles Meetup is a social group of outgoing, friendly, singles, (55+) who meet for coffee, conversation and friendship….oh yes, and laughter!

We promise that you’ll find a very warm welcome when you join us at one of our weekly get-togethers, held most Sunday mornings at 11:00 a.m., at Panera Bread in Dedham, (located on Route 1 in the Dedham Plaza). Just make sure to check the calendar first , as the location may change

This is an ongoing thing unless otherwise noted, so be sure to check the calendar weekly and PLEASE, rsvp so we'll be sure to have a seat for you!   We're usually in the back of the restaurant in the large banquette. 

 We ask that you NOT bring in drinks and food from other places and/or home.  Panera is very generous with the space and time they give to us and we want to support and give back to them.  Thank you.

 The original Meet Up group started with about 10 - 12 people who met at Panera in Stoughton  and were from Dedham, Framingham, Canton, Stoughton, Sharon and Brockton. Since that time our membership has spread to Brookline, Newton, Needham, West Roxbury, but based on popular demand, we want to make it convenient for people who live in the city, Metrowest, and north to join us as well.

Some of us are divorced, others widowed and some single...and we all have the same desire to expand our social life...meet new people, make new friends, and be busy with all that life has to offer us here in Greater Boston. That's why we've grown so much in just 4 years and made incredible friendships!

Whether religious, observant, or not observant at all, we also share a common heritage that brings us close. Being 55+ means we have lots of shared experiences and special memories too.

Keep in mind that we are not a ‘dating site’, but if you do meet someone special (and several of our members have) we’ll celebrate right along with you!

We are a dues paying group - $12.00 annually every January, or prorated @ $1.00/month if you join during the year. Once your membership is approved by having answered the five questions, we ask that you come to Panera within the next 30 days to meet us and determine if you wish to become a dues paying member. If we do no see or hear from you in 30 days we'll assume you've decided otherwise.

 

We hope to see you very soon!
item.name: Jewish Singles 55+ of Greater Boston
